text: <@U02613K0X> I know you mentioned yesterday you needed image sizes but I forgot to ask for a list of what images we need sizes for.
food and cocktail images for mobile, the long rectangle food images for the desktop eats page, cocktail hero images for desktop, cocktail circle images for desktop, and philosophy video poster frame
Thanks!
yep!
<@U026AP8CM> question about the eats page: Is the client planning on adding more categories or are they sticking with 4?
This affects 2 things: The menu bg asset doesn't repeat so if they add another category the menu will look weird.
The other, more import thing, is that data that I get from the CMS isn't structure in a way to easily display all categories and their contents on one page.
So, keeping time in mind, the easy/quick approach would be to hard-code categories but allow the client to add/remove items within those categories?
i'm catching up on this now
one second
code their eats page
they can change a pizza under pizzas, but they cannot add a 5th category, etc.
does this help?
Yes. Thanks
<@U02618EV1>: will send you follow up email for clarity.
